thread.title: BRIEF-Indra gets 10 mln euro order to deploy radars, modernise control center
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Indra gets 10 mln euro order to deploy radars, modernise control center | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Indra gets 10 mln euro order to deploy radars, modernise control center
text:
Oct 22 Indra Sistemas SA :
* Gets an order from Morocco-based Office National des Aeroports (ONDA) to deploy air traffic control radars and modernise the Agadir Control Center for about 10 million euros ($11.3 million)
* The radars will be installed in Safi and near Agadir and Ifrane airports Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8842 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
